languages.text: {n}Паскаль извлекает из складок робы несколько инструментов. И вы готовы поклясться, что эти вещи созданы не для того, чтобы разбирать машины. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} буднично произносит:{/n} "В случае затруднений при извлечении информации рекомендую прибегнуть к точечному воздействию на нервные узлы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль извлекает из складок робы несколько инструментов. И вы готовы поклясться, что эти вещи созданы не для того, чтобы разбирать машины. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} буднично произносит:{/n} "В случае затруднений при извлечении информации рекомендую прибегнуть к точечному воздействию на нервные узлы".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль извлекает из складок робы несколько инструментов. И вы готовы поклясться, что эти вещи созданы не для того, чтобы разбирать машины. {g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}Техножрец{/g} буднично произносит:{/n} "В случае затруднений при извлечении информации рекомендую прибегнуть к точечному воздействию на нервные узлы".

He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡从他的长袍中掏出了一些仪器。你敢拿自己的生命打赌，这些仪器绝对不是用来拆卸机械的。他漫不经心地开了口。{/n}“如果你在提取信息的过程中遇到困难的话，我建议你精确瞄准神经节。”{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡从他的长袍中掏出了一些仪器。你敢拿自己的生命打赌，这些仪器绝对不是用来拆卸机械的。他漫不经心地开了口。{/n}“如果你在提取信息的过程中遇到困难的话，我建议你精确瞄准神经节。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal saca una serie de objetos de su túnica. Estarías dispuest{mf|o|a} a jugarte la vida a que no son herramientas para reparar maquinaria. En tono informal, presenta una sugerencia.{/n} «Si la extracción de información presenta cualquier problema, sugeriría aplicar con precisión el instrumental sobre los ganglios».{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal saca una serie de objetos de su túnica. Estarías dispuest{mf|o|a} a jugarte la vida a que no son herramientas para reparar maquinaria. En tono informal, presenta una sugerencia.{/n} «Si la extracción de información presenta cualquier problema, sugeriría aplicar con precisión el instrumental sobre los ganglios».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルはローブからいくつもの器具を取り出す。これらの器具の目的が機械を分解するためでないことは間違いないだろう。彼は飄々と言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}「情報抽出の過程で困難に遭遇した場合は、神経節を正確に狙うことをお勧めします」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルはローブからいくつもの器具を取り出す。これらの器具の目的が機械を分解するためでないことは間違いないだろう。彼は飄々と言葉を紡ぐ。{/n}「情報抽出の過程で困難に遭遇した場合は、神経節を正確に狙うことをお勧めします」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal zieht mehrere Instrumente aus seiner Robe. Du würdest dein Leben darauf verwetten, dass sie nicht dazu dienen, Maschinen zu demontieren. Er sagt in gleichgültigem Ton:{/n} "Solltet Ihr beim Informationsbeschaffungsprozess Schwierigkeiten haben, schlage ich ein präzises Anvisieren der Ganglien vor."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal zieht mehrere Instrumente aus seiner Robe. Du würdest dein Leben darauf verwetten, dass sie nicht dazu dienen, Maschinen zu demontieren. Er sagt in gleichgültigem Ton:{/n} "Solltet Ihr beim Informationsbeschaffungsprozess Schwierigkeiten haben, schlage ich ein präzises Anvisieren der Ganglien vor."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sort de sa robe plusieurs instruments qui ne servent probablement pas à démonter des machines, puis déclare sur un ton désinvolte :{/n} « Si vous rencontrez des difficultés au cours de l'extraction d'informations, je vous recommande de cibler précisément les ganglions. »{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sort de sa robe plusieurs instruments qui ne servent probablement pas à démonter des machines, puis déclare sur un ton désinvolte :{/n} « Si vous rencontrez des difficultés au cours de l'extraction d'informations, je vous recommande de cibler précisément les ganglions. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, cübbesinden birkaç araç gereç çıkarıyor. Bu aletlerin, makineleri parçalarına ayırmada kullanılmadığından neredeyse adın kadar eminsin. Havadan sudan bahseder gibi konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bilgi ayıklama sürecinde herhangi bir zorlukla karşılaşacak olursanız doğrudan sinir düğümünü hedef almanızı öneririm."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal pulls a number of instruments out of his robe. You would bet your life that the purpose of these items isn't to disassemble machines. He says casually,{/n} "Should you encounter difficulties during the information extraction process, I would recommend precise targeting of ganglia."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, cübbesinden birkaç araç gereç çıkarıyor. Bu aletlerin, makineleri parçalarına ayırmak için kullanılmadığına neredeyse adın kadar eminsin. Havadan sudan bahseder gibi konuşmaya başlıyor:{/n} "Bilgi ayıklama sürecinde herhangi bir zorlukla karşılaşacak olursanız, doğrudan gangliyonu hedef almanızı öneririm."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal, cübbesinden birkaç araç gereç çıkarıyor. Bu aletlerin, makineleri parçalarına ayırmada kullanılmadığından neredeyse adın kadar eminsin. Havadan sudan bahseder gibi konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Bilgi ayıklama sürecinde herhangi bir zorlukla karşılaşacak olursanız doğrudan sinir düğümünü hedef almanızı öneririm."{g|Encyclopedia:TechPriest}{/g}
